title: UNIQUE! * Great 1 bedroom, 1 Bath Apt * Enjoy our Heated Pool! *
posting_body: ['Building Name:', 'West View Apartments', 'Property Address:', '2700-04 Aviation Blvd.', '#23, Redondo Beach, CA 90278', 'Rent: $1,775', '1 BR', '1 BA', 'PLEASE CALL, EMAILS ARE NOT MONITORED', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE: <URL>', 'Description:', 'WE GO THE EXTRA MILE FOR COVID-19 SAFETY - ..........
